teaser: First up, Dan Wisneski, Assistant Professor of Psychology at Saint Peter’s University, talks about his study that used a smartphone app to explore people’s experiences with morality in their day-to-day lives. And how well have you kept up with the week in tech news? It's time for Silicon Tally! This week, Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson takes on reporter Queena Kim in the heart of Silicon Valley.
title: Marketplace Tech for Friday, September 12, 2014
description: First up, Dan Wisneski, Assistant Professor of Psychology at Saint Peter’s University, talks about his study that used a smartphone app to explore people’s experiences with morality in their day-to-day lives. And how well have you kept up with the week in tech news? It's time for Silicon Tally! This week, Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson takes on reporter Queena Kim in the heart of Silicon Valley.
